WindowFence.summary: The fence read-only property of the interface returns a object instance for the current document context.

remarks.para: Fence objects are only available to documents embedded inside {{htmlelement("fencedframe")}}s (loaded via s) or {{htmlelement("iframe")}}s (loaded via opaque URNs).

blockquote.para: Note: See How do <fencedframe>s work? for some description around FencedFrameConfigs and opaque URNs.

remarks.para:
-Fenced frames on developer.chrome.com
-The Privacy Sandbox on developer.chrome.com

WindowFence.value: A object instance, or null if the document context does not have access to a object.
